column4: if You see a partition, hit enter.. on it, and then tell it what to partition, and keep doing that until you get the /swap and all of them partitioned
-- hover over the logical drive name you see, and hit enter
since you mention swap, is 2 gigs enough?
-- I believe it is saying.. do you want to make this an ext3 partition, and to do that you Edit the partition, and Make it a Partition of that type
